Contradict fact: The claim that the video shows protesters in Hong Kong using wearable projectors to foil facial recognition technology contradicts the fact that the video actually depicts an art project created by students at the Utrecht School of Arts.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misinterpretation of the video and does not provide any evidence or additional information to substantiate the assertion.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is related to the protests in Hong Kong without verifying the accuracy or context of the footage.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video captures an art project and was not intended for political purposes, as stated by the creator and participants of the project.
